comments.body: [~sershe] Sorry, it's my bad. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-2828?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel&focusedCommentId=14173468#comment-14173468. Fix is on HIVE-8465.
